data.name: Zero Hour - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack from Zero Hour, featuring 20 Official Soundtracks (about 1 hour 8 mins) composed and mastered by Muhaimen Zia. All tracks are of the highest quality, each consisting of various Official Album Art. You’ll also find a PDF containing words from the artist, talking about each track. As an extra, you will receive Beta Music from the beta phase of Zero Hour.

Available in WAV and MP3.
